column5: Seeing as this is one of the hardest winters to hit in a long time, I think we need to take a look at some summer pics and stay positive about the upcoming seasons. Because eventually summer will return. I know it seems a little far-fetched, but trust me on this one.  Lets see some of your favourite summer pics...
Gorgeous scenery in the third pic. Where is that?
not summer,,,, but the first RAINBOW that i FINALLY LANDED
Mega OFC shore lunch.......only 3 more months till the next one !!

Yes i know its almost spring but everytime i look out the door at all that snow,it seems so far away !!!!,nand i know my boat misses me i can hear her saying im lonley,she needs to be home in my driveway !!!!!  man im loosing it arent i ?????.....     nice pics eveyone,man i look forward to all that fun again !!!!

Jigger, I see the one pic is at Sturgeon Bay. How did you fare up there? Did you enjoy it? I have been going up there for 25 years. My parents used to own the resort (now part of the park) across the road.
Dude we will fish together again.. musky and back in the tribs ( this time I will werar some waders
This is currently the picture on my desktop. Ahhhhhhhhhhhhh. Soon I hope.
My partner in crime with a nice French River smallmouth.
Ahhh the sound of spring... right around the corner.. well it's a long 2 month "corner".. but it's coming...
Crappie fishing on opening day at the Kawarthas...  Beans, Motv8tr and Nanook   26 April 2008 this year !
Sunsets to my feet, Gotta love it
